title: Stealth Generator
content: The code below has a useless loop. The presence of the ``yield`` keyword in the function body makes it a generator. As such, foreach() will react to ``yield`` calls, though the function returns immediately, without a ``yield``. Hence, the empty loop, even though the function returns an array: indeed, to have the function behave as expected, it is necessary to remove the unreachable ``yield`` call, and then, the foreach() can use the return for the loop.
author: Frederic Bouchery
